How to buy from the store?: How to buy from the store?
Parents, childrens, users and customers: Parents, childrens, users and customers of Ferezi can get healthy snacks online through the website or buy in person at selected stores registered in Ferezi. Ferezi allows schools and educational centers that have buffets and restaurants to become active representatives of Ferezi products by registering in the Ferezi system.
Is it possible to cancel the order?: Is it possible to cancel the order?
Yes, of course. You can cancel your orde: Yes, of course. You can cancel your order from the Ferezi store. However, Ferezi store is not responsible for paying the delivery fee.
Is it possible to order for another pers: Is it possible to order for another person and deliver to her?
Yes, provided that the client is approve: Yes, provided that the client is approved in the Ferezi system.
How can I trust your online store?: How can I trust your online store?
You can be sure the quality of Ferezi pr: You can be sure the quality of Ferezi products by checking the opinions of customers, certificates, and valid reports. We must add that you can know the quality of products by visiting the permanent and temporary exhibitions of Ferezi and testing the food by parents and childrens.
Is it possible to buy installments in Fe: Is it possible to buy installments in Ferezi?
Yes, but the level and amount of install: Yes, but the level and amount of installments depends on the credit of the customer in the Ferezi system. Installments may increase or decrease.
Is it possible to pay COD on your websit: Is it possible to pay COD on your website ?
Yes, you can pay the fee to the salesper: Yes, you can pay the fee to the salesperson or the delivery agent when the package is delivered.
How long will it take for my order to ar: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
Under normal circumstances, in the city: Under normal circumstances, in the city of Muscat, within a radius of 15 kilometers, there is a Farzi snack supply center within a radius of 15 kilometers, and your package will reach you in less than 15 minutes. Of course, this range can be extended to a radius of 50 km in Muscat in normal conditions and outside of peak hours, and the delivery time will increase by a maximum of 30 minutes.
How can you return a defective product?: How can you return a defective product?
You can return defective goods to stores: You can return defective goods to stores and schools (as a Ferezi partner) before consumption. Defective goods can be returned to schools at the time of consumption. However, for schools that cooperate with Farzi, a percentage of the order is considered to cover defective goods
However, for schools that cooperate with: However, for schools that cooperate with Farzi, a percentage of the order is considered to cover defective goods
How do I use a discount code in your sto: How do I use a discount code in your store?
There will be different modes. It should: There will be different modes. It should be checked so that our ability and support capacity is consistent with common cases in these countries.
Is it possible to change the delivery ad: Is it possible to change the delivery address after the order placement?
Yes, if the customer agrees with the del: Yes, if the customer agrees with the delivery time at the new location and paying the difference, it is possible to transfer to the new address.
Is it possible to buy from your website: Is it possible to buy from your website in bulk and with a discount?
Anyone can buy Ferezi products in bulk a: Anyone can buy Ferezi products in bulk as a guest and use common discounts. But the schools that cooperate with Ferezi will benefit from special and varied discounts.
How can you track your order?: How can you track your order?
Through the website, the school, the tra: Through the website, the school, the transportation officer and by contacting Ferzei's response department
How much does it cost to send an order?: How much does it cost to send an order?
The delivery cost depends on the order v: The delivery cost depends on the order value, distance from the store to the delivery location, delivery time (express or regular), partner classification, and variable customer factors.
Can you add or remove a product after pl: Can you add or remove a product after placing an order?
Yes. Only if the order is not sent.
What happens if we are not present when: What happens if we are not present when the order is delivered?
It will be delivered to the second perso: It will be delivered to the second person approved by the customer. Or the product may be returned to the store after a certain time (5 to 10 minutes).
You can settle your bill in five ways: O: You can settle your bill in five ways: Online, Cash at the store or to the delivery person at your doorstep, Automatic payment from credit card, and settlement at the end of every month or every week
How can I buy from you without having a: How can I buy from you without having a second password?
We can't give an exact answer right now,: We can't give an exact answer right now, but you can check it on the internet, however, we will verify further.
Is there a limit to the shopping cart am: Is there a limit to the shopping cart amount?
No for the guest, but for the users and: No for the guest, but for the users and copartner of Ferezi, it will vary according to their financial capacity.
Is it possible to buy in person from the: Is it possible to buy in person from the store?
Yes, but not for all branches, but for s: Yes, but not for all branches, but for selected branches that can be in person or drive-through.
What cities do you ship to?: What cities do you ship to?
For urban and rural areas that are locat: For urban and rural areas that are located at a certain distance from the store (up to 50 km), it is done according to the normal procedure. For orders outside the scope of the store's services, due to Ferezi's commitment to the freshness and health of the products, delivery will be made at the store. Ferezi is responsible for the quality and quantity of the product until the time of delivery to the customer.
